articles.title: If your Pixel 5’s system sounds are annoyingly loud, a new update may fix that problem - The Verge
articles.description: Google is rolling out its January updates for the Pixel lineup, and the update for Pixel 5 might fix an issue with system sounds being a lot louder than expected. Some users started reporting the issue shortly after the phone’s launch in October.
